publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-951 Alasdair Allan: Housing Supply Task Forceâ€”That the Parliament welcomes the first meeting of the Housing Supply Task Force; notes that this taskforce incorporates a wide range of bodies with interest in housing, and hopes that this will provide a long-awaited way forward to tackle the shortage of affordable housing in many parts of rural Scotland. Supported by: Stuart McMillan*, John Wilson*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Alex Neil*, Bashir Ahmad*, Kenneth Gibson*, Robin Harper*, Bill Kidd*, Brian Adam*, Rob Gibson*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-951 Housing Supply Task Force (lodged on 29 November 2007) Sandra White*, Christine Grahame*
S3M-951 Housing Supply Task Force (lodged on 29 November 2007) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-951 Housing Supply Task Force (lodged on 29 November 2007) Joe FitzPatrick*
